name: hop
author: Authereum Labs, Inc.

scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && rm -rf tsconfig.buildinfo && rm -rf node_modules

//: Temporary overrides, remove when packages are updated. npm workspaces requires overrides at the root: https://github.com/npm/rfcs/blob/main/accepted/0036-overrides.md#only-root-package-may-contain-overrides
* react-scripts: Our react-scripts version is old and needs newer TS and linting versions to work. Remove when we update react-scripts.
* csp-html-webpack-plugin: The latest version uses an old version of html-webpack-plugin that has incompatible types. Remove when we use a different package than csp-html-webpack-plugin.
* type-fest: Not sure exactly which package breaks without this.
